text: Hello everyone, I have created a custom CRM card in Contact. I would like to know if it is possible to obtain the data for the selected contacts. On the card, there is a button called "action-hook-label" which I would like to use to retrieve the contact's data. Can you please advise me on how to achieve this? Thank you.

Also, let me know if there a good email to reach out and schedule something.

Hello developers,

I've created HubSpot app and connected it to my web application. When I create HubSpot ticket, attachments inside it aren't shown.

Sometimes in some accounts attachments are visible but sometimes not, WHY SO?

PLEASE ANSWER, AS THIS ISSUE IS FROM HubSpot SIDE !!!
